questions.quote: I think I'm getting tired of it. I mean is that all it does? Hello? La-la-la?
Ooo, yeah..   You know, it's gettin' kind of late, I, I really have to be going, so, uh, it's nice seeing you again, all right--
George, I don't have time for this. Uh, Anna, do you wanna talk to George?
Yeah, Go! Wha.. really? Yeah, ok. Yeah! Bye.  Great news! Yeah, the strike has been settled. I'm going back to work.
How you gonna catch him? He's probably boarded the plane already.
You know, Eddie, that might be just a tad harsh for womenswear.
Well, actually, he, um, doesn't really like to do... everything.
Oh no, you're not going out on a high note with me Mr. Kruger!
We-We're doing that evening of Eastern European National Anthems.
Pretentious? Who, who isn't pretentious? Ha, ha, if everyone who was pretentious was in a mental institution, ... uh, obviously THIS isn't a mental institution.
